headline: Nvidia Stock Rises. Watch This Figure From Microsoft, Meta, and Amazon Earnings.
summary: Nvidia  stock was gaining Monday, ahead of a raft of technology-company earnings that are likely to confirm the seemingly endless appetite for its artificial-intelligence chips.  Nvidia shares were up 0.9% at $175.06 in early trading.  Amazon.com Microsoft  and  Meta Platforms  all report this week and are major customers for Nvidia.
